data.name: Kabaret
data.detailed_description:
"The truth is this, every monster you have ever met, was once a human being."

Cursed into a monster, Jebat journeys into a realm called the "Alam". Taken in by the charismatic owner of Kabaret, known only as The Caretaker, Jebat is tasked with providing tasseomancy services to the dwellers in an effort to gather information on how to break his curse.


Each of the mythical creatures who visit the Kabaret come from Southeast Asian folklores and legends. Listen to their unique stories, give advice through tasseomancy, and find a way to break the curse.




  • Brew tea and speak to monsters from Southeast Asian folklore.
  • Play traditional Southeast Asian games.
  • Get to know characters inspired by actual myths and folklore from the region.
  • Featuring sounds of Hello Universe and Sambasunda Indonesia.
data.about_the_game:
"The truth is this, every monster you have ever met, was once a human being."

Cursed into a monster, Jebat journeys into a realm called the "Alam". Taken in by the charismatic owner of Kabaret, known only as The Caretaker, Jebat is tasked with providing tasseomancy services to the dwellers in an effort to gather information on how to break his curse.


Each of the mythical creatures who visit the Kabaret come from Southeast Asian folklores and legends. Listen to their unique stories, give advice through tasseomancy, and find a way to break the curse.




  • Brew tea and speak to monsters from Southeast Asian folklore.
  • Play traditional Southeast Asian games.
  • Get to know characters inspired by actual myths and folklore from the region.
  • Featuring sounds of Hello Universe and Sambasunda Indonesia.
data.short_description: Welcome to the Kabaret - where monsters from Southeast Asian myths and folklores dwell. Decipher tea leaves, play traditional games, and question your humanity.
data.reviews:
“Imagine walking into a bar and meeting so many different people from different lives and backgrounds. Now, replace them with mythical monsters from Southeast Asia coupled with an interesting backstory for each monster. That’s Kabaret for you.”
IGN Southeast Asia

“Kabaret’s entirety (characters, story, gameplay) is inspired by SouthEast Asian folklore. A visual novel where you will be playing as Jebat who was transformed into a monster with 30 nights to break his curse.”
Indie Watch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.4Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15
  • Processor: 2.33Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, gore, and decapitation in certain parts of the game. Players be advised.
